Self.Wiki: Handles Ironeye's Marking, such as damage and animations of characters

healthPercentDamage.Wiki: How much percent health to remove when triggered

healthPercentTrigger.Wiki: How much percent health must be removed to trigger

damageTakenRate.Wiki: How much extra damage character takes when affected

animationId.Wiki: Animation to play when weak point triggers

dummyPolyId.Wiki: Dummy poly the marking signal attaches to
